thread.title: Celebrating July 23 Revolution anniversary reflects honoring record of Egyptian struggle: Egypt's amb. in Paris-SIS
thread.title_full: Celebrating July 23 Revolution anniversary reflects honoring record of Egyptian struggle: Egypt's amb. in Paris-SIS

title: Celebrating July 23 Revolution anniversary reflects honoring record of Egyptian struggle: Egypt's amb. in Paris-SIS
text: Media Center Celebrating July 23 Revolution anniversary reflects honoring record of Egyptian struggle: Egypt's amb. in Paris Thursday، 11 July 2024 - 03:33 PM Egypt's Ambassador in Paris Alaa Youssef said celebrating the anniversary of July 23 Revolution reflects an honoring record for the Egyptian struggle with its values and firm principles that led to rectifying the track once again during June 30 Revolution that laid down the pillars of the new republic. In his word Thursday before a reception organized by the embassy on the 72nd anniversary of July 23 Revolution that was attended by a big number of high-level French officials, senate member and ambassadors accredited in France and UNESCO in addition to a big number of the Egyptian community living in France the Egyptian ambassador said, July 23 Revolution represented a turning point in the modern Egyptian history, pointing out that it has even set an example for freedom and independence to a number of the countries of the world. He referred to Egyptian efforts meant to improve economic capabilities and attract foreign investments in the different economic sectors especially in the SCZONE.
